channel.title: Grenades won't explode after loading screen
channel.description:
If you throw a Grenades and it hasn't bounced to the ground and you then enter a loading screen it won't explode and will just lay there. :freeman:
Video: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=83D3CqMjp00[/url]
